static double intp(double[] tab, double x, double xmin, double xmax)
          intp interpolates the array tab with n+1 equidistant points in [xmin,xmax] at the location x; an error message is produced on attempting extrapolation.

                          double x,
                          double xmin,

intp interpolates the array tab with n+1 equidistant points in [xmin,xmax] at the location x; an error message is produced on attempting extrapolation.

intpextp

public static double intpextp(double[] x_vals,
                              double[] y_vals,
                              double x)
Inter- and extrapolation of tabulated functions given by an array x_vals with INCREASING (but nonequidistant) values, and the associated y values y_vals. x is the value for which inter(extra-)polation is sought. On extrapolation, the left value y_vals[0] (right value y_vals[n]) is outputted if xx_vals[n]). NOT TIME OPTIMIZED

Parameters:
x_vals - the x_vals
y_vals - the y_vals
x - the x
Returns:
the double
